entry.title: Thursday night: Showers. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Rain showers beginning this evening then changing to freezing rain after midnight. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early this evening. Wind becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 after midnight. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Thursday 11 May 2023
